title: Hadi to be flown to Singapore for treatment on Monday
body: Bangladesh interim government in consultation with doctors and family has decided to shift Sharif Osman Hadi to Singapore by an air-ambulance on Monday afternoon for better treatment, said a press release shared by chief adviser’s press wing. On Friday afternoon, Hadi was shot in the head in Box Culvert area of Bijoynagar while he was conducting his electioneering, a day after the Election Commission announced the schedule for the 13th JS elections and the national referendum on February 12, 2026. CCTV footage showed that Hadi was heading towards Bijoynagar on an auto-rickshaw when the two men wearing helmets on a motorcycle opened fire on him on the Box Culvert road before fleeing the scene. A 13-member interdisciplinary medical board said that Hadi’s overall health condition remained very critical. Law enforcement members detained three suspects over shooting Sharif Osman Hadi, an aspiring independent candidate in the upcoming national polls for the Dhaka-8 constituency as his health condition remained ‘very critical’ till Sunday night. While the police identified one more assailant as Alamgir Sheikh, the motorcycle rider, the law enforcers was yet to arrest Alamgir and the pillion of the motorcycle Faisal Karim Masud, suspected shooter, who took part in Hadi’s electoral campaign for a few days.
